Plot: Wannabe actors become regulars in the stylish neo-lounge scene; Trent teaches his friend Mike the unwritten rules of the scene.
Title: Swingers
Actors: Jon Favreau, Vince Vaughn, Ron Livingston, Patrick Van Horn
tomatoConsensus: Funny, heartfelt, and effortlessly cool, Swingers made stars out of Vince Vaughn and Jon Favreau, established Doug Liman as a director to watch.
